result.arabic_text: ۞ لَّا يُحِبُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ إِلَّا مَن ظُلِمَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعًا عَلِيمًا
result.translation: 148. Yalli maxcoocak uma maxco fayya haanam makicni yundullume num kaa yudlume numih umaanet yaabam kaah xiqtam akke waytek, Yalli fayya heenim hinnay Ramma heenim yaabbi, Qellut Abeenim yaaxigi kinni.
